data.eml:eml: Annotated checklist of the rotifers (Phylum Rotifera) in the Catalogue of Life

A taxonomic database of accepted and the most commonly used synonyms in the phylum Rotifera with information on biogeography. The database was prepared under the Freshwater Animal Diversity Assessment project. This version supplied for the Catalogue of Life by FADA is based on a print version, published in the journal Zootaxa (see&lt,ahref=&quot,http://www.mapress.com/zootaxa/list/2007/2007-08.html#Zootaxa%201564&quot,target=&quot,_blank&quot,&gt,http://www.mapress.com/zootaxa/list/2007/2007-08.html#Zootaxa%201564&lt,/a&gt,or&lt,ahref=&quot,http://www.mapress.com/zootaxa/2007f/zt01564p104.pdf&quot,target=&quot,_blank&quot,&gt,http://www.mapress.com/zootaxa/2007f/zt01564p104.pdf&lt,/a&gt,. Users are urged to use and cite this printed version.
